text: There is no factory method to construct a FormulaEvaluator
creator: richard.evans@datanomic.com

text:
Fixed in r713021

Usage:
FormulaEvaluator evaluator = workbook.getCreationHelper().createFormulaEvaluator();

Also reflected in the docs: http://poi.apache.org/spreadsheet/eval.html

Yegor
creator: yegor@dinom.ru
